subject: Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
California Chrome (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: California Chrome ran through his only significant workout on Saturday, a week before he takes aim at the Triple Crown in the Belmont Stakes.
snippet: California Chrome ran through his only significant workout on Saturday, a week before he takes aim at the Triple Crown in the Belmont Stakes.
